metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1912 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.8.3 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) lastname, (2) firstname, (3) email, (4) job, or (5) signature parameter to htdocs/user/card.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
